answers.answer: Codeine phosphate is addictive. As far as liver damage, I am not as familiar with the contents in Corex, but cough syrup is bound to be hard on the liver and maybe the kidneys.
r u from indiabecoz i think its very famous in here?

Corex doesn't cause liver damage.  It causes Kidney failure in high quantities.  It's liquid base is made mostly of sugar which can be very dangerous if you have diabetes.  More importantly, it has codeine....one of the milder opiates but nonetheless very addicting.  Are you tired of being a slave to medication?  We can help you
